title: LG Signature 65" OLED65G6P - Overview G6P OLED65
description:
LG Signature 65 Black UHD 4K OLED 3D Smart HDTV With WebOS 3.0 - OLED65G6P
http://www.abt.com/product/98195/LG-OLED65G6P.html 

Experience breathtaking picture quality from the all new LG Signature 65 Black UHD 4K OLED 3D Smart HDTV With WebOS 3.0 - OLED65G6P. LG OLED TVs are truly a new category of television and the OLED65G6P model is packed with riveting technology that combines an ultra-premium design with the best picture ever. Discover the stunning benefits of OLED HDR all of which deliver brilliant brights along with the deepest darks for infinite contrast levels and rich colors. The 4K HDR TV also displays Cinematic Color with a range of hues thats on par with the high-end projection system youd find in professional digital cinema. Not to mention LGs Picture-on-Glass concept provides the 4K OLED TV with its clean ultra-slim profile by carefully applying the micro-thin OLED panel directly onto a glass frame. In addition the sleek base at the bottom of the OLED TV is fitted with the TVs speakers which are constructed to include a hinge that allows for easy wall-mounting. Prepare to watch your favorite entertainment in a whole new way and start by taking a look at the LG Signature 65 UHD 4K OLED Smart HDTV in-store or online today at Abt.
Features:
• 4K Ultra HD (3840 x 2160)
• HDR Pro
• Perfect Black Panel
• Color Prime Pro
• Billion Rich Colors
• Ultra Luminance
• 4K Upscaler
• Pixel Dimming
• webOS 3.0
